title: Access Requirement Search Request
description: Describes the parameters for searching Access Requirements

nameContains.description: Optional substring used to filter Access Requirements by name

accessRequirementIds.description: Optional list of ids used to filter access requirements with specific ids.

relatedProjectId.description: Optional id used to filter Access Requirements to retrieve only those that have been applied within a particular project.

reviewerId.description: Optional principal ID used to filter Access Requirements to retrieve only those that can be reviewed by the specific reviewer.

accessType.description: Optional filter by type of access

type.description: Optional filter by the access requirement fully qualified concrete type (e.g. org.sagebionetworks.repo.model.ManagedACTAccessRequirement)

nextPageToken.description: A token used to get the next page of a particular search query.
